Name: Armoured Onslaught
About the game: Armoured Onslaught is an explosive blend between a top down shooter and a tower defence. You pilot BARI, a powerful mech armed with a variety of powerful weapons. Build up your defences, upgrade your turrets, and use BARI to take the fight to the enemy. You will need a combination of skill and strategy to successfully fight off the unending armoured onslaught and protect the reactors, humanity's last hope for survival. Play through 12 frantic campaign levels across 4 varied landscapes, containing hundreds of unrelenting waves of enemies. Compete for the high score against a never ending horde of enemies in Endless Onslaught mode. Battle against a variety of enemy vehicles, including tanks, long range artillery, helicopters and more. Features four unique and challenging boss battles. Defeat enemies to earn energy, which can be spent on a mixture of weapons, mech upgrades and turrets. Either play alone, or team up with a friend in local split-screen multiplayer for twice the destruction.
